MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML9 postcode area of Larkhall. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out a shutdown at 6:45pm to safely complete repairs on a underground cable fault from earlier and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:08pm on Friday, 09 April 2021
